name: City Bike Messenger 3D - eXtreme Road Bicycle Street Racing Simulator Game PRO
name_original: City Bike Messenger 3D - eXtreme Road Bicycle Street Racing Simulator Game PRO
description:
** THIS VERSION HAS NO IN GAME ADS **
Get ready for an intense bike racing game, where you play the role of a NY City bike messenger! You'll have to avoid an onslaught of traffic and other obstacles, and you try to race around the city to make your deliveries!!

FEATURES:

- Cool 3D graphics!
- Awesome sound track!
- Easy tilt controls!
- Dynamic Traffic
